title: Can't ping level progress anymore?
body:
I can't seem to ping level progress anymore, it used to be that you ping your experience bar and it'd say "78% towards lvl 6" or something like that.
Where if you ping the bar now, it just comes up with "Alive" ping.

I found it particularly useful when playing roaming champs like Sol, Taliyah, TF etc. so my team knew how close I was to roaming and could have time to let the enemy push, I've seen junglers like Noc use it too.

Is it gone?
thats a shame.

replies.body:
Thats so weird that it's working for you guys.
Its definitely not working for me (at least not in the same place)

ill have to try clicking around a bit.
No its still there lol, must be on your end.

It is DEFINITELY not gone that is for sure. 

I'm able to ping in all games? 

Is it still not working even in the new patch?
??? I could do it last game >_< but it does have such a narrow place to ping it from, maybe you just kept missing it :P I know I do all the time hahaha
